Detailed Description

template<class Real>
class mdragon::Vector3< Real >

Vector3 represents three dimensional template vector class.

Parameters:
'Real' parameter defines vector components numeric type.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

y_ - value of Y component.
z_ - value of Z component.

Bool NearlyEquals (  const Vector3< Real > &  v1,
const Vector3< Real > &  v2,
const Real  radius
)  [related]
 

Determines, if two points (vectors) are located within given radius.

This function performs rough computing.

Parameters:
v1 - first point (vector).
v2 - second point (vector).
radius - radius.
Returns:
Returns True, if two points are within given radius, else - False.

Vector3< Real > RotateVector3 (  const Vector3< Real > &  v,
const Matrix4< Real > &  tm
)  [related]
 

Rotates vector by matrix.

This function don't use translation portion of matrix (_14, _24, _34) to transform vector in optimization purposes.

Parameters:
v - source vector.
tm - transformation matrix.
Returns:
Returns rotated vector.
